title: Patch wont finish...
body: Once the patch finishes loading it restarts and I'm not able to play... what do I do???

replies.body: There's a few different things that could have gone wrong there, and if you have any more info about what happens that might be useful to troubleshooting, but in the meantime we should make sure to check up on your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) just in case you're missing the settings for League.
